description:
servicegroup_driver = mc
memcached_servers = blabla  # blabla does not exists

Neither n-cpu or n-api log indicates any connection issue or give any clue the join was unsuccessful, the n-cpu logs the same two DEBUG line regardless to the success.

The services are reported down, with nova service-list, as expected.
title: memcache servicegroup driver does not logs connection issues

comments.content:
servicegroup_driver = mc
memcached_servers = blabla  # blabla does not exists

Neither n-cpu or n-api log indicates any connection issue or give any clue the join was unsuccessful, the n-cpu logs the same two DEBUG line regardless to the success.

The services are reported down, with nova service-list, as expected.

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/136351
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=746fb8ea7488575d1043b5d66c4fe6d16b7f9be6
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 746fb8ea7488575d1043b5d66c4fe6d16b7f9be6
Author: jichenjc <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Nov 19 10:23:01 2014 +0800

    Indicate whether service is down for mc driver
    
    memcache driver for service didn't log any clue
    whether the service is down or not. This patch add a
    log to indicate it at DEBUG level.
    
    Closes-Bug: #1382564
    
    Change-Id: I05e12b56411f4475d1ef50e90e09abf75d7355b0
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
